tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Fan Friday! - The Political Machine 2012 (Learn something edition)
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: In a world where Jesse and Crendor decide who becomes the next president of the United States and are left to manage the last two candidates - they create what could be the most extreme examples from either party. Who will win? The Welfare French Robot Atheist powered by Solar Energy, Elitism, and Hemp: Democatron 4000? Or The Creationist, Anti-Gay, Big Business, Hillbilly Chik-fil-a Tycoon Oil Baron: Billy-Bob BBQ? FIND OUT!!! IN THIS WEEKS FAAAAAAAN FRIDAY!!!! • Get epic OMFGCata gear! goo.gl or www.rodeoarcade.com • Stay connected! Twitter - twitter.com Facebook - facebook.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Chik-a-fila is a stupid chicken sandwhich place who had a 'anti gay' thing were﻿ all the money from the christian morons who attended went to a anti gay thing.
UNLIMITED WELFARE!!!!!!!﻿
Noo! He needs to run as Obi﻿ wan, and jesse needs to run as the emperor xP
I love how Obamas﻿ character has high charisma and low credability
I don't think they care. I don't﻿ get why people do.
Haha﻿ XD
This was﻿ great
damit i﻿ live in oregon
Offend me to! :D Offending circle!﻿ :D!!!
but even if they dont care,they should know whats going on.i mean, it was on the news for﻿ quite a while.But oh well,both of these are still halarious :D
I'm the archmage﻿ of the entire U.S.!
Ik but i wanna be offended﻿ like he was D:
So﻿ with you there!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
MY PARTY IS BETTER﻿ THAN YOU'RE PARTY! WE HAVE NACHOS BEER AND PROSTITUTES!
it still sounds like something i can﻿ buy over the counter at a fast food joint....DELICIOUS!!!
is that﻿ like KFC?
do they not know whats going on with Chick-Fa-let?﻿
what?﻿

Just for the record i wasnt actually﻿ insulting from a point of dislike. I only did that because he said it, I dont dislike this guy/girl at all. But the demand to be offended thing really really made me wanna yell at him a little :)
the comments are just﻿ like the IRL Political campain
You're a wizard﻿ Tom!

Reviewer.Job: im under 18 what do you expect
im under 18 what do you expect
im under 18 what do you expect
